name: Business Analyst Life Sciences (Strategy and Management Consulting)
description:
• We are currently looking for an Analyst to join our team based in Moscow that will be involved in development and delivery of multiple strategy and management consulting projects with Life Science clients.

    Projects are highly analytical in nature leveraging the IQVIA information assets and cover a broad spectrum including Commercial Model Optimization, Post Merger Integration, Portfolio Strategy, Multichannel Marketing Strategy, Advanced Forecast Models etc.).
    Our clients rely on our knowledge, experience, and aptitude for problem-solving to optimize strategies across their organizations.

    Our ability to leverage and manipulate big data, coupled with our in-depth understanding of pharma industry and healthcare system, puts us in a unique position to deliver high-quality insights that address a variety of client needs.

    Main Responsibilities

    • Conducting desk research to a specific brief using internal and external sources
    • Performing quantitative analyses to aid development of recommendations
    • Contributing to the preparation, execution and follow up of client workshops
    • Taking direct responsibility for creating sections of reports, presentations and other client deliverables
    • Proactively developing knowledge of the healthcare industry and IQVIA proprietary data sources

    Formal Qualifications And Experience

    REQUIRED KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS & ABILITIES

    • Master's Degree in Economics, Business Engineering, Business Administration
    • 1-2 years of related experience in consulting, and at least one solid experience in data analysis, market research, ideally in the pharmaceutical and/or healthcare industry
    • Perfect command of Microsoft Excel and PowerPoint
    • Fluent in English

    Specific Skills And Abilities

    • Customer and result-orientation
    • Data-driven
    • Ability to lead advanced data analyses (briefing for data extract and analysis, interpretation, design,…) with a use of various tools
    • Ability to translate data analyses into conclusions & actionable recommendations
    • A positive drive with a hands-on spirit, and a pragmatic, innovative approach
    • Team player and ability to work in a multicultural team
    • Understanding of pharmaceutical/healthcare market and what drive their business is a plus
    • Spirit of accountability, sense of initiative and continuous improvement
    • Confidence and assertiveness
    • Shows the ability to manage multiple projects, juggle priorities and deliver on tight deadlines
    • Excellent presentation, communication and client influencing skills

    At IQVIA, we believe in pushing the boundaries of human science and data science to make the biggest impact possible – to help our customers create a healthier world. The advanced analytics, technology solutions and contract research services we provide to the life sciences industry are made possible by our 70,000+ employees around the world who apply their insight, curiosity and intellectual courage every step of the way. Learn more at jobs.iqvia.com.
